@Tim Abbott @Rishi Gupta In reference to issue #6311 are we expecting something like this(image). Also, copy-paste functionality working fine for me.
These carets seem intuitive to me, should I remove them?
Screenshot-from-2017-09-04-22-54-21.png

hm, good question. @Brock Whittaker, thoughts on what the separator should be in the end? I think just a line will look messy, but I agree that the carets are not intuitive either. Should this just be vertical space?

@Shubham Dhama: Both Tim and Brock are travelling, so just as a heads up you might want to start working on another issue in parallel as well, as this could take a few days to be resolved. Thanks!
We could do a line with the new date in larger text in the middle.

seems reasonable to me. Is that better than the current bar, though?
It's possible we just want to solve the copy-paste problem (by making them non-selectable), and leave them visually as is.

@Rishi Gupta is this what you're sayingScreenshot-from-2017-09-17-16-21-10.png
Setting .no-inputclass for date separators can make dates unselectable
I'm good with this solution, if others are. I think the current separators look good visually (if we're going to have separators at all).
We presumably want to have the current date still selected for copy-paste, right? So maybe we only want to set this for the yesterday piece?
That should just come from the recipient bar date, maybe?
Yes, assuming that doesn't create ordering problems.
possibly we could also have this version of copy include no dates or times at all
